meanings.definition: Relating to speeds greater than five times the speed of sound.
meanings.sent1: The hypersonic jet broke the sound barrier effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The military is developing hypersonic missiles for faster attacks.
meanings.sent3: The hypersonic race car zoomed past the competition with ease.
meanings.sent4: Her hypersonic typing speed amazed her coworkers.
meanings.sent5: The hypersonic winds of the storm caused chaos in the city.

meanings.definition: Moving at a speed greater than five times the speed of sound.
meanings.sent1: The hypersonic aircraft soared through the sky with incredible speed.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying hypersonic flight for future travel possibilities.
meanings.sent3: The hypersonic turtle surprised everyone by winning the race.
meanings.sent4: The hypersonic pace of the marathon runner left spectators in awe.
meanings.sent5: The hypersonic growth of the company was unexpected but welcomed.
